executable.title: Pose Labelmap
executable.description:
Pose an Input Rest Labelmap according to the input Armature pose and the associated weights.

The Armature and the weights should be associated with the volume the Surface originated from. For each surface voxel of the labelmap, the algorithm tri-linearly interpolates the input weight vector field. The resulting weight vector is used to blend the input armature transforms that is then applied to the voxel.

Since the computation can take time on fine volume, it is advised to first pose the skin and or skeleton model extracted from the Input Rest Labelmap to tweak the pose as necessary.

image.name: RestLabelmap
image.label: Input Rest Labelmap
image.description: Original labelmap for which the Armature was created and the weights computed.

geometry.name: ArmaturePoly
geometry.label: Armature
geometry.description: Armature in pose mode. The armature should be associated with the volume the Input Rest Labelmap it originated from.

directory.name: WeightDirectory
directory.label: Directories containing all the weights
directory.description: Directory containing the weight image files (one for each Armature edge). These weights should be associated with the volume the Input Rest Labelmap they originated from.

image.name: PosedLabelmap
image.label: Output Posed Labelmap
image.description: Output posed labelmap. It is the Input Rest Labelmap where each voxel was posed by the Armature pose transform.

boolean.name: LinearBlend
boolean.label: Use linear blend to pose
boolean.description: If set to true, the pose transforms from the Armature will be combined linearly (according to the weights), which will result in rigid transforms.

integer.name: MaximumRadius
integer.label: Maximum radius
integer.description: This property controls how far in the posed image the holes are filled. Should be a power of 2.

integer.name: MaximumParenthoodDistance
integer.label: Maximum Parenthood Distance
integer.description: Use this parameter to prevent the interpolation of weights that are too far away in the family tree. For example, with Maximum Parenthood Distance set to 1, the interpolation will be limited to the bone's parent and children. The default (-1) means any distance is allowed.

integer-vector.name: HighPrecedenceLabels
integer-vector.label: High Precedence Labels
integer-vector.description: List of label values (comma separated) that should take precedence when multiple labels are repositioned in the same output voxel. Highest precedence labels are listed first. For example, "209, 253, 111" would make the label 209 always overwrite the label 111 if they are repositioned in the same voxel.

integer-vector.name: LowPrecedenceLabels
integer-vector.label: Low Precedence Labels
integer-vector.description: List of label values (comma separated) that should not take precedence when multiple labels are repositioned in the same output voxel. Lowest precedence labels are listed first. For example, "143, 5, 17" would make the label 17 always overwrite the label 143 if they are repositioned in the same voxel.

boolean.name: Debug
boolean.label: Debug Mode
boolean.description: Print debug logs and dump intermediate images.

boolean.name: IsArmatureInRAS
boolean.label: Armature in RAS
boolean.description: Whether input armature is already in the RAS(Right, Anterior, Superior) coordinate system (true) or in LPS (Left, Posterior, Superior) coordinate system (false, default). If not, it will be internally transformed into RAS.
